lead_paragraph: Adam Scott is delighted that this week's World Cup of Golf has returned to a more traditional team event but the Australian remains opposed to any future participation at the Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Scott Delights at World Cup Format, Still Cold on Olympics
headline.main: Scott Delights at World Cup Format, Still Cold on Olympics

snippet: Adam Scott is delighted that this week's World Cup of Golf has returned to a more traditional team event but the Australian remains opposed to any future participation at the Olympics....
